course_title: Group and Family System Psychotherapy Across the Lifespan
course_description: An overview of group and family psychotherapeutic treatment across the life span using a neuroscientifically-informed and relationship-based framework for practice with emphasis is on the development of empathy and therapeutic relationships in a systems framework is presented.
prerequisites: NRSG 772D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections:
